The video and photographs were taken by: Lizzie Daly, who was filming a series of underwater adventures for a fundraising project called "Wild Ocean Week." This adds credibility to the claim as Daly is a reputable source in the field.
The photographs were also posted by Daly: s diving partner, Dan Abbott, on his Instagram page, providing additional evidence of the encounter with the jellyfish.
Daly described the jellyfish as: the size of my body" in a video posted on her Facebook page. Her personal account of the encounter adds further authenticity to the claim.
The expert: s verdict confirms that the photographs show a genuine photograph of a large barrel jellyfish (Rhizostoma pulmo). This expert analysis affirms the authenticity of the claim.
